summary: This is the Noldorian take on the \"Elite Rogue Armour\" by KungFuMasterPS which offers a standalone female armour for UNP, which is sexy, but not skimpy. A golden metal texture replacer version for the original armour is also being included.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P1EXhg9l.jpg[/IMG]

About this mod

A few months after I have created this recoloured version I finally decided to release this on the Nexus too.

This is the Noldorian take on the \"Elite Rogue Armour\" by KungFuMasterPS which offers a standalone female armour for UNP, which is sexy, but not skimpy. A golden metal texture replacer version for the original armour is also being included, if you prefer the brown leather to the blue. If there is interest I may create other variants too, so stay tuned for further updates.

The armour can be crafted at every forge and is fully temperable and enchantable.

All textures have been thoroughly compressed and are at about the size of the Beth HD DLC textures for maximum compatibility and performance.

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I had the honour to be able to get some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod.


Requirements

Skyrim 1.8+ is required for this mod to work. For the Golden Metal replacer version you also need the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30189]original mod[/url] by KungFuMasterPS.


Installation

Download the mod file and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data and say \"yes\" when being asked to integrate and override.

Choose either the main or the hotpants version if you prefer a more revealing look.


Un-installation

Delete the file via NMM or manually by deleting the files contained in the mod folder within your Skyrim \"Textures\" folder.


Compatibility

The main version is compatible with everything except the original mod by KungFuMasterPS.

Credits

Credits go to...

- KungFuMasterPS for the creation of this wonderful armour model and his decision to share it freely -> check out his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30189]original mod[/url]
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim and the HD texture packs
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the  day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of modding work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of beta testers :

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/705688]Seren4xx[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1784046]netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/351527]TomAraya[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2015975]Yyna[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/69377]Grace Darkling[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/259193]SydneyB[/url]

The gallery on this front page is a tribute to YOU and your contribution, your friendly help and encouragement and as well to your inspiring and outstanding screenarchery work. THANK YOU SO MUCH!


Permissions

You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.

Gallery

Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the \"Credits\" section. Enjoy it!

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oBi3jmAl.jpg[/IMG]
by Seren4xx

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aA1I23rl.jpg[/IMG]
by Yyna

more are coming soon...


Author\'s note :

If you like this mod please take a second to show your apprechiation, leave a comment or load up a picture - I\'d be really grateful for it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you enjoy a mod a few clicks should not be too much to ask for. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution.
author: EcthelionOtW
